thread.section_title: Holiday inn Express London - Vauxhall Nine Elms - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Free use of a 4G device to take out and about
thread.title_full: Free use of a 4G device to take out and about - Review of Holiday inn Express London - Vauxhall Nine Elms, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ThefamilyBuj
title: Free use of a 4G device to take out and about
text:
Good value to be found if staying here compared to hotels just that little further in.
Just over 5 minute walk to Vauxhall station and busses stop right outside the hotel so good links into the city center.
Free breakfast included in the stay as well (Standard with Holiday Inn Express) which adds to the value.
Also they have just added a new 4G device in each room which you can take out and about for free during your stay. Great if you are a foreign visitor as it will save you on roaming charges for data on your mobile/cell phone. It lets you browse and make calls for free and on the move. GREAT IDEA FOR TOURISTS.
Downsides are that rooms are small, only have a shower and you can hear the noise from the trucks, police and buses on the main road if your room is facing it.
